Requirements You are riding your mount.

You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Command an Animal] to order your mount to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Stride] twice. At any point during this movement, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Strike] one enemy within reach or within the first range increment of a ranged weapon. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll.
